content: While family and friends can provide support and encouragement for someone with diabetes to maintain a healthy lifestyle, it is important to note that there is no cure for diabetes and alternative treatments such as herbal supplements or acupuncture are not proven to cure or manage diabetes effectively. Additionally, some herbal supplements can interfere with diabetes medications and cause other health problems. It is important for anyone with diabetes to work closely with healthcare providers to manage their condition using evidence-based treatments and to avoid relying on unproven remedies.
